document_data.name: Thessaloni Canos
document_data.mainbody: '''Thessaloni Canos''' was the [[tharchion]] of the island tharch of [[Aloar]] in [[Thay]].
document_data.Description: Thessaloni was a tall woman even by [[Mulan]] standards. She was quite handsome with a pleasant face, hooded green eyes, and weather-beaten skin. She usually wore scale armor and ornaments of coral, pearl, and scrimshaw. Her skin was also tattooed in an aquatic motif. Her favorite weapon was the [[trident]].
document_data.Reputation: Thessaloni was considered one of the most capable commanders in Thay.
document_data.History: In [[1385 DR]], during the war of the [[zulkirs]], Thessaloni and her men fled to the [[Wizard's Reach]] and secured both [[Escalant]] and [[Laothkund]] for the council of zulkirs.
